event.title: <show-title>Scream (2022)</show-title> <event-type-title>Brunch</event-type-title>
event.headline: There's a certain set of rules for surviving brunch
event.description:
Order from our tasty brunch menu – Egg BLT, French Toast, or Breakfast Tacos – and pair with a brunch cocktail classic like our Habanero Bloody Mary. Each are available to order along with our full menu at this special brunch screening.

Twenty-five years have passed since that first, deadly call was answered, and now a new killer has donned the Ghostface mask in Woodsboro. After a group of teens connected to the original murders are targeted, Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell), Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox), and Dewey Riley (David Arquette) reunite to face their past. With the body count rising, they’re going to have to abide by certain rules if they want to survive.

SCREAM sees Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, and David Arquette reprise their iconic roles to take on a new killer before history repeats itself. With all the thrills, chills, and kills you expect from this legendary franchise, you’ll fall in love with scary movies all over again. Just remember, it could be anyone behind the mask…

eventType.title: Special Menu
eventType.headline: Sink your teeth into your favorite films
eventType.description: From STAR WARS-themed milkshakes to twelve-hour LORD OF THE RINGS marathon feasts, our chefs whip up movie-inspired specials that’s like nothing else you’ve ever experienced.

event.title: <show-title>Scream (2022)</show-title> <event-type-title>FAN EVENT WITH Q&A LIVESTREAM</event-type-title>
event.headline: Peer behind the mask at the SCREAM fan event with Q&A livestream
event.description:
Be the first to see who’s behind the mask at this livestream Q&A screening for SCREAM super-fans. Members of the SCREAM team will be livestreamed into the theater after the credits to answer your most cutting questions.

Twenty-five years have passed since that first, deadly call was answered, and now a new killer has donned the Ghostface mask in Woodsboro. After a group of teens connected to the original murders are targeted, Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell), Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox), and Dewey Riley (David Arquette) reunite to face their past. With the body count rising, they’re going to have to abide by certain rules if they want to survive.

SCREAM sees Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, and David Arquette reprise their iconic roles to take on a new killer before history repeats itself. With all the thrills, chills, and kills you expect from this legendary franchise, you’ll fall in love with scary movies all over again. Just remember, it could be anyone behind the mask…

eventType.title: Livestream Q&A
eventType.headline: Experience exclusive conversations with actors and filmmakers
eventType.description: Catch a special screening followed by a livestreamed conversation with the actors and filmmakers.

show.title: National Champions
show.headline: How much is one player worth in an $18 billion game?

portraitHeroImage.altText: National champions CHAMPIONS UNIT 210517 00128 RC rgb 500px

marketStrings.value: The personal closed captioning device displays feature film dialogue and other audio in the form of English-language text for individuals who are deaf or hard of hearing.

The descriptive audio headset provides individuals who are blind or have low vision with an English-language narration of the details of the feature presentation that can't be understood by the soundtrack alone.

The assisted listening headset provides an amplified audio signal for those individuals who are hard of hearing. A 3.5mm headphone jack is available to drive hearing aids, neck loops, or cochlear implants.
You may not enter a movie after it has started. If you show up to your desired screening late, we will happily exchange your ticket for a different showtime or for a raincheck to a future show.

sessionAttributes.name: All Ages
sessionAttributes.description: Get ready for maximum family fun! Our All Ages screenings include pre-show activity sheets and crayons, a relaxed noise policy, kids menus, and a free prize for kids 12 and under. All ages welcome with a parent or guardian.

sessionAttributes.name: Brunch
sessionAttributes.description: Both our regular and Brunch menus are available at this screening. Arrive hungry.

sessionAttributes.name: Kid Friendly
sessionAttributes.description: Grab the fam and let the fun begin! Our Kid Friendly screenings include pre-show activity sheets and crayons, a relaxed noise policy, kids menus, and a free prize for kids 12 and under. Ages 3+ welcome with a parent or guardian.

sessionAttributes.name: Sensory Friendly
sessionAttributes.description: Our all-inclusive screenings welcome babies, infants, nursing moms, and guests with Autism and other sensory needs. Sound will be quieter. Theater will be a little less dark. Chatter, walking around, and babies being babies are A-OK.

formats.title: 2D Digital
formats.headline: Digital format projected using a digital projector.
formats.description: Digital format projected using a digital projector.

agePolicies.name: All Ages
agePolicies.description: All ages including babies are welcome with parent or guardian.

agePolicies.name: !!DO NOT USE!! Standard (2201)
agePolicies.description:
Children ages 3+ admitted before 6pm.
Children ages 6+ admitted after 6pm.
All minors under the age of 18 must be accompanied by an adult.

agePolicies.name: Rated PG
agePolicies.description: Guests under 18 must be accompanied by an adult. Children 3 and up allowed for shows that start before 6pm. Ages 6 and up after 6pm.

agePolicies.name: Rated PG-13 (Standard) (2201)
agePolicies.description: 18 and up. Guests ages 6-17 are welcome any time with a parent or guardian.

agePolicies.name: Rated PG with Adult Focus (2201)
agePolicies.description: 18 and up. Guests ages 6-17 are welcome any time with a parent or guardian.

agePolicies.name: Rated R (2201)
agePolicies.description: 18 and up. Guests ages 6-17 are welcome any time with a parent or guardian.
